name: Full Retreat Package
description: Experience a week of holistic wellness with our full retreat package.

details.Schedule: Accommodation, daily yoga and fitness classes, organic meals

name: Daily Classes
description: Join daily yoga and fitness classes during your stay.

details.Schedule: Multiple classes per day (yoga, pilates, HIIT, etc.)

name: Private Yoga Sessions
description: Enhance your practice with personalized one-on-one yoga sessions.

details.Description: Enhance your practice with personalized one-on-one yoga sessions.

name: Nutrition Consultation
description: Receive expert guidance on nutrition and dietary choices.

details.Instructors: Improved diet, energy, and overall well-being
details.Benefits: Benefits: Gain a better understanding of your dietary needs, improve your overall health, and enhance your well-being through personalized nutritional guidance.

name: Wellness Workshops
description: Participate in informative wellness workshops led by experts.

details.Description: Participate in informative wellness workshops led by experts.

name: Group Retreat Booking
price: Custom pricing (for groups of 5 or more)
description: Book the retreat for your group and enjoy a tailored experience.

details.Description: Book the retreat for your group and enjoy a tailored experience.
details.Instructors: Special discounts, group activities for groups of 5 or more participants
details.Duration: Custom pricing (for groups of 5 or more)
